history.narrative: Law 20-27, the “Testing Integrity Act of 2013,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-109. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 4, 2013, and June 26, 2013, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 23, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 20-120 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-27 became effective on October 17, 2013.
